ds.graphics
Class DrawTools

java.lang.Object
  ds.graphics.DrawTools

public class DrawTools
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains static methods which open, close, and erase the drawing surface as well as methods that control the view of graphical frames.

Field Summary

static boolean openWindowCalled
           
 
Constructor Summary
DrawTools()
           
 
Method Summary
static void closeWindow()
          Closes the drawing surface and disposes all of the components.
static void delayWindow(double sec)
          Displays the current frame in the window for a specified number of seconds and then continues program execution.
static void drawShape()
           
static void eraseWindow()
          Clears all of the figures from the drawing surface.
static DrawPanel getDrawingPanel()
           
static void openWindow()
          Opens a window as the drawing surface in the center of the screen.
static void viewWindow()
          Displays the current frame in the window until the user press the ENTER key.

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

getDrawingPanel

public static DrawPanel getDrawingPanel()

openWindow

public static void openWindow()
Opens a window as the drawing surface in the center of the screen. The surface has a predefined coordinate system with base point (0,0) in the upper left-hand corner of the screen, width 10, and height 8. A menu contains a command to print the window.

drawShape

public static void drawShape()

delayWindow

public static void delayWindow(double sec)
Displays the current frame in the window for a specified number of seconds and then continues program execution.

viewWindow

public static void viewWindow()
Displays the current frame in the window until the user press the ENTER key.

eraseWindow

public static void eraseWindow()
Clears all of the figures from the drawing surface. .

closeWindow

public static void closeWindow()
Closes the drawing surface and disposes all of the components.
